samples.name: Artistry Studio My Main Sqeeze Moisturizer
samples.instructions: use on clean skin as desired. Morning moisture, bedtime bliss, on-the-go refreshment

samples.name: Sleep Gummies
samples.instructions: Take 2 gummies thirty minute before bedtime. Chew thoroughly before swalling

samples.name: Artistry Go Vibrant Cream Lipstick - Berry Special Evening
samples.instructions: With lips slightly open, swip over lips from one side to the other on the bottom

samples.name: Artistry Studio Zen + Energy Gloss Boss Cleanser + Exfoliator
samples.instructions: Put an almond-size drop in palm of hand. Rub hands together and massage over wet skin

samples.name: Artistry Skin Nutrition Hydrating Mousse Cleanser
samples.instructions: Dampen face with warm water. Apply 1-2 pumps in hands and massage over skin. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry

samples.name: Artistry Signature Select Brightening Body Cream
samples.instructions: Sqeeze cream in hand and apply liberally to skin. Preferly use after bath or shower when skin is still damp

samples.name: Artistry Skin Nutrition Hydrating Eye Gel Cream
samples.instructions: Use Pearl size, gently pat under and around the eye area using light tapping motions.

samples.name: XS Raspberry Lemonade Twist Tube
samples.instructions: Add 1 twist to 16.9 fluid ounces of cold water

samples.name: XS Joint Health Raspberry Twist Tube
samples.instructions: Add 1 twist to 16.9 fluid ounces of cold water

samples.name: Artistry Skin Nutrition Hydrating Gel Cream
samples.instructions: Smooth evenly in upward motions over face and neck. Use AM and PM

samples.name: Artistry Skin Nutition Renewing Reactivation Eye Cream
samples.instructions: Using a pearl-size amount, gently pat under and around the eye area using light tapping motions. Use AM and PM

samples.name: Artistry Men Facial Moisturizer
samples.instructions: Use a pea-size drop. Apply product to your face and throat. Gently massage in circular motion, moving upward and outward, to smooth it over entire face

samples.name: Artistry Men Gentle Face Wash
samples.instructions: Dampen your skink with warm water. Apply pea-size drop of cleanser to fingertips. Massage into face and neck in circular motion until you reach a thick lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry with towel

samples.name: Artistry Signature Select Hydrating Body Gel
samples.instructions: Sqeeze gel out of the tube and smooth over skin as needed. Use twice daily. Best use after bath or shower when skin is still damp. Can also treat yourself at night to some self-care pampering as you prepare for bed
